data.title: 15 Things You Should Know About Charlie Chaplin
data.meta_description:
15 Things You Should Know About Charlie Chaplin - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Charlie Chaplin was a famous English actor, director and composer during the silent film era. Some key facts about Chaplin include: 

1) He started performing as a child, replacing his ill mother in a stage performance at age 5. 2) Despite being the real Charlie Chaplin, he came in third place in a Charlie Chaplin look-alike contest in 1915. 3) He was the first actor to appear on the cover of Time Magazine in 1925. 4) Chaplin became richer than the President of the United States in 1916 due to his high salary. 5) He refused to make "talkies" and continued making silent films into the 1930s.
data.text: 15 Things You Should Know About Charlie Chaplin
